title: Dictionary entry schema
description: A schema to map words to concepts

konsep.description: A container to hold a list of meanings with respect to each contexts

konteks.description: A list of contexts in which the meaning is used (in shortened form, should be found in '.metadata')

makna.description: The meaning of the word in the context given above

ragam_istilah.description: Other words used to mean the same thing

contoh_ayat.description: Example sentences where the word is used with such meaning

contoh_frasa.description: Example phrases where the word is used with such meaning

terjemahan.description: A list of word from different language with the same meaning {'lang_id':list(string)}

ragam_ejaan.description: A list of different spellings used for the same word

akar.description: A deconstruction of the word form
